187665.「まず 説明をさせてもらおう。\n ここでは 貴公の持つ 防衛メダルと素材を使い:
First, let me explain... This is where you use your defense medals and materials to create weapons, shields, and other equipment.
The equipment will have an alchemical effect, but I don't know what that effect will be. It may depend on your luck. More powerful
equipment will be added in the future, but even then, you'll be able to choose your old equipment... ... I'll explain... So, if you
complete your mission...

187666.「む……。貴公の そうびぶくろが\n いっぱいで 受け取れないようだ。\n 空き:
Hmm... seems your equipment bag is full. Make
some room and then come back.
<bw_break>

187667.「まず 装備レベルを選んでくれ。\n 貴公の選んだ 装備レベルの装備が\n 生成:
First, choose your equipment level. The
equipment of your chosen level will be
generated.<break>

187670.「……よし 完成した。\n 受け取るがいい。\n<end>:
...Okay, I've created it. Here you go.
<end>

187671.「では 生成を開始しよう。\n しばし 待ってくれ……。\n<end>:
I'll starting making it. Please wait a
moment...<end>

187672.「<%sM_CATEGORY>の<%sL_GOODS_ITEM>だな。\n すま:
<%sM_CATEGORY> <%sL_GOODS_ITEM... I'm sorry,
I'm not sure what I can do. Do you mind if I
generate this for you?<yesno2><break>

187673.<pipipi_on>\n「他にも 何か 生成するか？\n<yesno><bre: <pipipi_on>Do you want me to generate something else?<yesno><break>

187675.「<%sM_CATEGORY>の<%sL_GOODS_ITEM>を 生成するには:
We're missing something we need to generate
<%sL_GOODS_ITEM> for <%sM_CATEGORY>...<bw_break>

187677.「ここでは 貴公の持つ 防衛メダルと素材を使い\n 武器や盾などの装備品を 生成:
This is where you use your defense medals and materials to create weapons, shields, and other equipment. The equipment will have an
alchemical effect, but even I don't know what that effect will be. It may depend on your luck. We'll be adding more powerful equipment
as we go along, but even then, you'll still be able to choose your old equipment.

187678.「さて 貴公は 何をしたい？\n<break>: Now, what do you want to do?<break>

187679.「他に 何か 用はあるか？\n<break>: Is there anything else I can do for you?<break>
